mapper.select: SELECT jr.add_time, js.action, js.action_desc, js.score, jr.note FROM jf_record jr LEFT JOIN jf_rule js ON jr.source_id = js.id WHERE jr.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT * FROM jf_record jr WHERE jr.user_id = #{userId}
AND (jr.action = #{type} OR jr.source_id = 11)
AND (jr.action = #{type} OR jr.source_id = 12)
ORDER BY jr.add_time DESC
SELECT SUM(jr.score) FROM jf_record jr WHERE jr.expire = 0 AND jr.user_id = #{userId}
